name: ranivorous
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
used to refer to animals or birds that eat frogs: The ranivorous falcon is a native of the Cape of Good Hope. Ranivorous rodents include kangaroo rats and pocket mice.
More examplesFewer examplesThere are two stomachs as in ranivorous fowls.In ranivorous birds, the contraction of the strong muscular gizzard affords a necessary aid to digestion. I have not heard that any ranivorous propensities have been developed by the surrounding human population.
